content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or emotions to have a favorite art piece. However, I can provide some interesting facts about these famous art pieces. For instance, The Mona Lisa is a portrait of a woman that is believed to be Lisa Gherardini, the wife of Francesco del Giocondo. The Starry Night depicts Vincent van Gogh's view from his asylum room window in Saint Rémy de Provence at night. The Scream is a haunting painting by Edvard Munch, which is said to represent the anxiety of modern man. The Persistence of Memory shows melting clocks, which is believed to represent the fluidity of time.
